BIO

I am Diksha, a 4th year Engineering student. I am currently trying to learn as much as I can, by exploring different technologies, and working on a number of small and large projects.
Through all the experimentation, I would say my interest lies in Web Development.

What I like

I love sunsets and travelling. I also love exploring more and more - be it things or places.
